backend/main.mo: Defines product, enquiry, feedback, message, settings, and user profile types with storage, sorting helpers, and authorization mixins for admin-protected operations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented admin-authentication features with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Defines OKLCH-based light/dark theme variables and applies Tailwind base styles for layout and theming.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app with favicon and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, themes, and all public/admin routes including guarded admin sections.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button that clears admin session and query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name with backend integration.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with logo, quick links, contact info, and a Caffeine.ai credit section.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main page layout including top navigation, content outlet, footer, WhatsApp button, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Implements a responsive top navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus, branding, nav links, and login button.
frontend/src/components/whatsapp/WhatsAp: Displays a floating WhatsApp button using settings to generate a prefilled chat link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides admin session checks, passkey verification, and user profile fetch/save hooks using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, loading, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for products, enquiries, submissions, and site settings with admin session validation.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark design tokens for the app's color system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard with tabbed navigation for managing products, enquiries, and site settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEnquiriesP: Standalone page rendering the admin enquiries panel.
Displays all enquiries with actions to confirm or reject them using dialog prompts and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminFeedbackPa: Fetches and displays customer feedback in a table with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Provides the admin dashboard layout, navigation, and page routing with logout handling.
Handles admin login flow using Internet Identity and passkey verification with redirect logic.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMessagesPa: Shows all contact form messages in a table with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Manages product listing and creation, including file upload, form handling, and add-product mutation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRouteGuard: Protects admin routes by redirecting users who are not authenticated or unlocked.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Admin settings form that loads site settings, allows editing fields like contact info, WhatsApp config, and pricing table, and saves them via updateSettings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTwoStepAcc: Twoâ€‘step admin login UI handling Internet Identity login and admin passkey verification with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdvantagesPage.tsx: Renders a page listing HDPE pipe advantages using cards and sets the document title on mount.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form that validates input, sends messages via API, and displays company contact details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with hero content, features, navigation buttons, and an about section.
frontend/src/pages/OrderEnquiryPage.tsx: Provides an order/enquiry form with validation, file upload handling, and submission to backend APIs.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays all products with images, details, availability status, and site certification info.
Shows various HDPE pipe applications using icon-based cards and sets the page title on mount.
frontend/src/utils/adminCredentials.ts: Empty placeholder file for admin credential utilities.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: Manages admin session state in sessionStorage with functions to set, clear, check, and subscribe to admin unlock changes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, requirements, and issues related to implementing admin code authentication.
